channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: ğŸ”´ 08:47 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take shelter!
item.description: ğŸ”´ 08:47 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
